moves.1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5: Karo Kann opening. One of my favourites.
Now I have a weak c pawn but this is compensated by the wite's isolated pawn.
moves.13. Nc3 Rb8 14. a3: I think this was a mistake. White should have played b3.
I calculated this move very hard and a came to the conclusion that I could gain material and positional advantage.
moves.18. Be5: White tries to remove one the defenders of d5. Better was 18. Bg5
moves.18... Nd7: Another good move would have been 18. Bb4. But I was most interested in exchange material.
moves.19. Nxd5 Nxe5 20. Qxa3 Qxd5 21. dxe5 Qxe: Now all I hve to do is to hang on the material advantage.
moves.23. g3 h6: Eliminating any threats in my back rank.
moves.24. Rxc6: White took the bait. Now multiple threats materialize
moves.24... Rd1+: I found this was the best one.
moves.25. Kg2: If 25. Kh2 then 25.... Qe1 followed by mate on g1 or h1.
